Package org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.types

Class HardToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.internal.UpgradeableDataHashMap
      • org.ejbca.core.model.hardtoken.types.HardToken
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IUpgradeableData
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EIDHardToken, EnhancedEIDHardToken, SwedishEIDHardToken, TurkishEIDHardToken
    public abstract class HardToken
extends UpgradeableDataHashMap
implements Serializable, Cloneable
    HardToken is a base class that all HardToken classes is supposed to inherit. It function is to define the data the token is supposed contain.
    Version:
    $Id: HardToken.java 19901 2014-09-30 14:29:38Z anatom $
    Author:
    TomSelleck
    See Also:
